column_description: A 3-character code uniquely identifying the country
The official name of the country

column_description: The region within the continent where the country is located
value_description: Caribbean, Southern and Central Asia, Central Africa, Southern Europe, Middle East

column_description: The total surface area of the country in square kilometers
The year the country gained independence, if applicable
The total population of the country
The average life expectancy of the country's population
The Gross National Product (GNP) of the country, indicating its economic performance
The previous Gross National Product (GNP) of the country
The name of the country in its local language
The form of government in the country
